data.title: Inmate Visitation—Harris County Texas Sheriff's Office
data.text:
Remote Video Visitation Schedule – Harris County Jail Facilities

Video visitation is only for Inmates housed at the 700 N. San Jacinto Building.

Off-site, remote video visitations can be done using your personal computer and web cam.

Monday – Friday, 4 – 9 p.m.

Saturday – Sunday, 8 a.m. – 9 p.m.

Off-site video visits cost $5.99 for a 20-minute visit. To apply for an account and schedule a video visit, click here to see instructions. If you need any help, please call Securus at 1-800-844-6591 during official visitation hours or call 346-286-1480 after hours.

Remote Video Visitation Schedule- LaSalle Correctional Facility (XL55, XL56)- NO COST

Monday – Friday, 3 p.m. –8 p.m.

Saturday, 8 a.m. – 9 p.m.

To schedule a visit, call (318) 495-6209 (Monday-Friday 8 a.m. – 4 p.m.) and ask for the Visitation supervisor.

Visits are 20 minutes in duration.

Visits cannot be scheduled on the day of the visit. A minimum of 1-day prior to visit is required.

Visits can be scheduled up to seven days in advance of the visit.

REMOTE VIDEO VISITATION SCHEDULE- LASALLE JEFFERSON COUNTY JAIL, TX (X281, X282, X283)

Jefferson County Downtown Jail offers tablet video visitation by creating an account at the following address:

www.jailatm.com

Available Monday – Sunday from 8:00 a.m. – 10:30 p.m.

Remote Video Visitation Schedule- Giles W. Dalby Correction Facility - PT55, PT56, PT57

Video Visits – IC Solutions: (866) 516-0115 Video visit are 10 a.m. to 9 p.m. (7 days per week)

REMOTE VIDEO VISITATION SCHEDULE- TALLAHATCHIE COUNTY CORRECTIONAL FACILITY (CT55/CT56)

Tallahatchie County Correctional Facility offers Tablet video visitation by accessing the following web address: corecivictallahatchie.gtlvisitme.com

Inmate Calls
